<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"
    xmlns:prem="http://premiumwrapper.motor.itgi.com">
    <soapenv:Header />
    <soapenv:Body>
      <getMotorPremium>
        <policyHeader>
          <messageId>1964</messageId>
        </policyHeader>
        <policy>
          <agent />
          <contractType>PCP</contractType>
          <expiryDate>12/16/2022 23:59:59</expiryDate>
          <inceptionDate>12/17/2021 00:00:00</inceptionDate>
          <previousPolicyEndDate>12/16/2021 23:59:59
          </previousPolicyEndDate>
          <tieup />
          <vehicle>
            <aaiExpiryDate></aaiExpiryDate>
            <aaiNo></aaiNo>
            <capacity>5</capacity>
            <engineCpacity>1200</engineCpacity>
            <exShPurPrice></exShPurPrice>
            <grossVehicleWeight></grossVehicleWeight>
            <grossVehicleWt></grossVehicleWt>
            <itgiRiskOccupationCode></itgiRiskOccupationCode>
            <itgiZone>A</itgiZone>
            <make>HA12A</make>
            <regictrationCity>DELHI</regictrationCity>
            <registrationDate>08/07/2019</registrationDate>
            <registrationState />
            <seatingCapacity>5</seatingCapacity>
            <type />
            <vehicleBody></vehicleBody>
            <vehicleClass>PCP</vehicleClass>
            <vehicleCoverage>
              <item>
                <coverageId>IDV Basic</coverageId>
                <number></number>
                <sumInsured>472860</sumInsured>
              </item>
              <item>
                <coverageId>PA Owner / Driver</coverageId>
                <number></number>
                <sumInsured>Y</sumInsured>
              </item>
              <item>
                <coverageId>No Claim Bonus</coverageId>
                <number></number>
                <sumInsured>25</sumInsured>
                </item>
                <item>
                <coverageId>CNG Kit Company Fit</coverageId>
                <number></number>
                <sumInsured>N</sumInsured>
                </item>
                <item>
                                <coverageId>Legal Liability to Driver</coverageId>
                                <number></number>
                                <sumInsured>N</sumInsured>
                              </item>	
            <item>
                <coverageId>Towing & Related</coverageId>
                <number></number>
                <sumInsured>N</sumInsured>
            </item>
            <item>
				<coverageId>CNG Kit</coverageId>
				<number></number>
				<sumInsured>0</sumInsured>
				</item>
            <item>
                <coverageId>New Vehicle Replacement</coverageId>
                <number></number>
                <sumInsured>N</sumInsured>
            </item>
            <item>
                <coverageId>NCB Protection</coverageId>
                <number></number>
                <sumInsured>N</sumInsured>
            </item>
                </vehicleCoverage>
            <vehicleInsuranceCost />
            <vehicleSubclass>PCP</vehicleSubclass>
            <yearOfManufacture>2019</yearOfManufacture>
            <zcover>CO</zcover>
          </vehicle>
          </policy>
        <partner>
        <partnerBranch>ZOOM_BROKER</partnerBranch>
          <partnerCode>ITGIMOT184</partnerCode>
          <partnerSubBranch>ZOOM_BROKER</partnerSubBranch>
        </partner>
        </getMotorPremium>
    </soapenv:Body>
      </soapenv:Envelope>
